snippet: Metropolitan Diary: Growing up in the Great Depression, a 9-year-old boy had to share his bed with a boarder who would come home late from a bar.
abstract: Metropolitan Diary: Growing up in the Great Depression, a 9-year-old boy had to share his bed with a boarder who would come home late from a bar.

headline.main: A Boy's Revenge on a Noisy Bed Mate
